articles.title: Not spooked by Halloween ghost stories? You may have aphantasia - The Conversation AU
articles.description: If a friend seems to be immune to your spooky, ghost story this Halloween, ask them if they can see the story unfold in their mind’s eye.
articles.content:
Halloween movies often feature kids sitting around a campfire sharing gory, spooky stories, trying to get someone to scream in fear.

articles.title: PH renews call for 'urgent' climate action, justice in regional summit - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Philippines has renewed its call for 'urgent' climate justice and urged nations to take action on the matter during the 16th East Asia Summit held this week.
